page.title: Text to Pay Feature
page.content:
Text to Pay Feature

By providing EnerBank USA your mobile phone number, you consent to us sending you text messages in conjunction with the Text to Pay feature.

  • Message frequency will vary based on account preferences.
  • Your mobile carrier’s message and data rates may apply.
  • To opt out of payment reminder text messages only, text STOP to 62668. An opt-out confirmation message will be sent back to you.
  • For support, text HELP to 62668 or email us at accountprocessing@enerbankusa.com.
